BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feature: extend shard chanbes api to support data streams and aliases (#118937) Extends the `/{index}/ccr/shard_changes` API to accept data stream and alias names in addition to index names. This allows users to retrieve shard changes for data streams and indices accessed through aliases. When a data stream is provided, the API targets the **first backing index** for retrieving shard changes. Similarly, for an alias, the API targets the **first index** associated with the alias.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [CI] Unmute SecureHdfsRepositoryAnalysisRestIT Should be fixed by #118331 Resolves: #118970
